thread.title: CHP Consulting Takes on Larger London HQ, Opens New Detroit Office
thread.title_full: CHP Consulting Takes on Larger London HQ, Opens New Detroit Office

title: CHP Consulting Takes on Larger London HQ, Opens New Detroit Office
text:
CHP Consulting Takes on Larger London HQ, Opens New Detroit Office September 02, 2015, 07:00 AM Related: ALFA Systems , CHP Consulting 
CHP Consulting has announced new London headquarters to accommodate its growing headcount.As of 1st September, CHP takes up residence at Moor Place, EC2, a location chosen for its light and space as well as location and size. CHP has also expanded in the U.S. to take on new premises in Birmingham, Michigan, near to various key clients in and around Detroit, the automotive capital of the U.S.Michael Mayes, Client Relationship Director at CHP Consulting, said: “After five years at Gresham Street we are delighted to have secured Moor Place as CHP’s headquarters for the next ten years. It’s a reflection of our continued success that we need to double our floorplan as we take on new clients and staff.”Richard Raistrick, Director of Operations, North America, said: “With our ALFA Systems in greater demand than ever, we are continuing our expansion in the USA with several exciting new projects underway. The new location in Birmingham demonstrates our strong growth and long-term commitment to the North American market.” Today's Other News
